content: Bookings for the total company for the second quarter were $124 million, down 10% and down 7% on a constant currency basis, which is entirely due to declines in our lower-margin transactional business, which we believe has stabilized on a quarterly run rate basis. Bookings for Global Knowledge in Q2 were $46 million, down 27% and down 21% in constant currency. Adjusted gross revenue in the quarter was down $148 million, down 5% and down 2% on a constant currency basis. Adjusted revenue for the Skillsoft Content segment in Q2 was $99 million, up 3% and up 5% in constant currency. Q2 adjusted revenue for Global Knowledge was $50 million, down 19% and down 13% in constant currency. Q2 adjusted EBITDA was $33 million, down $2 million, a decrease of 5% compared to last year, and up 1% constant currency. Second, the continued strength of the dollar will also have a negative impact to our full year bookings and our revenue outlook of approximately $15 million and adjusted EBITDA of approximately $4 million. Please proceed with your question. Please proceed with your question. Please proceed with your question. Please proceed with your question. Please proceed with your question.
